name: Amplify
description:
---------------------------------------------------


What is Amplify?

Amplify is a stylized first person shooter combining common elements from a first person shooter and merging them with an open-world environment, a wacky theme, and gameplay changing mechanics.


---------------------------------------------------

What is it about?

An anonymous group of people have been kidnapping civilians all around the world. These people have later been found dead in random locations. Authorities getting involved trying to find this group are being killed without any way of figuring out who killed them. Military is later sent in to watch over the United States. An anonymous tip tells where this groups base of operations may be located. You are a special forces operator part of the GSCTU (Global Secret Counter Terrorism Unit). You and your squad launch a raid on the base. During this raid you are captured and put into a simulated reality making your main goal to escape alive. 

---------------------------------------------------

Current State

Amplify in its current state is under development. Occasional development builds are being put out so the community can help find issues and get a feel for the game. If you have any questions or want to follow up on the community join our discord server.
